description.value:
The graveknight unleashes a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] of energy. Creatures in the area take limited use area damage for a creature of the graveknight's level with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:|basic:true] based on a high DC of the graveknight's level.

The graveknight can use this ability once every [[/br 1d4 #Rounds]] rounds.

This energy damage is of the same type as that of their ruinous weapons, and Devastating Blast gains the associated trait.
